basics.name: Jishnu Warrier
basics.label: Computer Engineering Graduate Student & Research Assistant
basics.summary: Master's student in Computer Engineering at NYU Tandon, focusing on building intelligent, scalable systems at the intersection of AI and software engineering.

work.name: SAI Lab - NYU
work.summary: Designing a graph-constrained, multi-agent RL + LLM pipeline that tackles an NP-hard scheduling problem, accelerating post-disaster electrical grid restoration while providing explainable, constraint-aware plans.

work.name: Chubb
work.summary: Architected and implemented backend infrastructure for AI-powered systems and product recommender platforms.
highlights: Architected and implemented the entire backend infrastructure of a product recommender system using FastAPI to generate 100+ personalized assets through LLMs, increasing campaign engagement by 25%
Designed and implemented SQL-based workflows to create, clone, and manage prompt templates
Designed a concurrency management wrapper that improved Databricks job throughput by 30% in high load periods
Developed a real-time monitoring system for travel policies, enabling risk based alerting with 1min latency, reducing incident response time by 60%
Integrated machine learning models to develop dynamic pricing strategies, enabling real-time price surging
Streamlined deployment processes using Docker and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)

work.name: Nanyang Technological University
work.summary: Developed deep learning pipeline for student engagement detection using computer vision.
highlights: Developed a deep learning pipeline to classify student engagement levels using webcam video data
Processed and integrated 19,000+ video samples from EngageNet and EmotiW datasets
Built an ensemble model combining ViViT (Video Vision Transformer) and Temporal Convolutional Networks (TCNs)

education.institution: New York University, Tandon School of Engineering

projects.name: SpotifyBuddies: Organic Playlist Recommender
projects.summary: Built a comprehensive recommendation system with end-to-end MLOps pipeline for playlist recommendations.
highlights: Built a 40 GB data-prep pipeline that merged Million Playlist and Echo Nest datasets, computed 100M+ userâ€“playlist overlaps in minutes
Implemented a FastAPI micro-service delivering 1000-user batch recommendations <300ms on CPU
Deployed an end-to-end MLOps pipeline on Chameleon Cloud with Terraform & Ansible

projects.name: EfficientDebates: Pruning-Based Multi-Agent Reasoning with Small LLMs
projects.summary: Designed an adaptive pruning-based multi-agent debate protocol for improving reasoning accuracy of small LLMs.
highlights: Designed an adaptive pruning-based multi-agent debate protocol that boosts reasoning accuracy of small LLMs on GSM8K to 90.3%
Reduced average inference to 3.27 LLM calls per sample by asynchronously triggering debates only when agents disagree
Benchmarked against Self-Consistency baselines, demonstrating cost-efficient accuracy improvements

projects.name: License Plate Recognition
projects.summary: Built an end-to-end computer vision system for Indian license plate recognition.
highlights: Curated and pre-processed a custom dataset of Indian license-plate images with augmentation and OpenCV transforms
Built a YOLOv5 detector plus contour-based character segmentation and CNN OCR
Implemented a novel rule-based state-code auto-correction layer that significantly boosted end-to-end accuracy
